name: Lotus Boutique Inn & Suites Daytona Beach / Ormond Beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were surprised to read so many wonderful reviews of this hotel. However, we stayed just one night and it is a lovely little hotel. Very upscale decor, right ON THE BEACH, nice pool, hot tub, firepit on the beach, and cabanas where you can hang out by the pool. The room was luxurious and very modern. We only met one of the staff people who checked us in, but he was very friendly and helpful. We would definitely stay here again. It was also close to many restaurants.
reviews.title: Beautiful little hotel

reviews.text: Very nice room, beautiful beach, stunning pool, very friendly staff, overall a most pleasent stay. This is the place to stay if you want to be on the beach and close to Daytona, but without the noise of Daytona.
reviews.title: Great Hotel
The most peaceful, relaxing place....
reviews.text: The lotus inn was the most peaceful place we have stayed at. The staff was so nice (escpially Neel) and would basically give you anything you wanted (that's how nice they were). The owners even came out and asked us how our stay was. The decor was a treat as well, clean, simple, and modern. The pool area was the best part. You think being steps away from the beach you wouldn't swim in the pool, but it's so relaxing, heated as well!! This is the best hotel you will find overall.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bonus:
reviews.title: Very pleasant hotel, breakfast could be better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Saltwater pool
reviews.title: Not number one

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent the last two days at this resort for my husband's birthday. We are Orlando residents so this was a quick weekend getaway. Unfortunately, the weather was poor but this resort was fantastic! In a nutshell - I felt like I needed a passport to get there. We love Daytona, but this is not one of your typical Daytona / Race / Bike Week / Spring Break hotels. This place has class and is incredibly clean. Beer, wine, cheese free happy hour, 24 hour coffee machine and the rooms have a modern vibe. What you don't know from their website is that every room has a refridgerator, coffee maker and microwave. We stayed in room 205 and it had two beds, separated by the glass shower bathroom. The staff, a perfect fit for the resort. Everyone we encountered was pleasant and eager to help and answer any questions. As soon as we can predict hot, sunny weather, we will be returning. We will never stay anywhere else in the area.
reviews.title: Loved the Lotus

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I believe your opinion of this motel may vary with the room you book, but I imagine the theme is the same. An old motel remodeled on a modern concept that is very much a triumph of form over function.
reviews.title: A swing and a miss

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very white. Very hard lines. Very stark lighting. These things make it, to me, an uncomfortable place that I do not want to spend any time in. Think the opposite of cosy comfort and you'll be about there. To get this look, even if this is your thing, the finish needs to be perfect and it just isn't.
reviews.title: Great stay - wonderful accommodations

reviews.text: A special feature is the beds featuring protruding hard bases with sharp corners at shin / knee height for a wicked moment of pain and bruising. And petty annoyances like nowhere to hang towels and a Continental breakfast that is actually a selection of tiny muffins. And a terrible coffee machine.
reviews.title: Highly recommended !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On the plus side it is right by the beach. But so are a lot of other hotels, where you might actually look forward to returning to your room, after doing whatever you want to do in Daytona.
reviews.title: South Beach Style Oasis in Daytona Beach
All around great!!
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel the last week of December and have nothing but good things to say! We arrived the day of check in several hours before our scheduled checkin after driving 20 hours and wanted to see if there was anyway we could check in early. The very friendly staff allowed us to check in at 12p which was absolutely wonderful! The room was astounding! Clean, modern, and all of the amenities you could want... Plus an outstanding view! The grounds were also very well kept and very nice. We went for a getaway to catch some rest and relaxation and found it here! We HIGHLY recommend this hotel to anyone!!

We stayed at the Lotus Boutique Inn last week and it was GREAT !!!!!! Neel and his staff were outstanding. I was there to visit my brother, who has recently had a stroke, to bring Christmas to him. I work in the hotel industry and they went above and beyond my expectations. The room was excellent and the amenities were perfect. The fire pit was wonderful and relaxing after spending the day with my brother. The hot tub was amazing for melting the stress of the day away. They are in the process of updating the dog walk, which will only improve your visit. We will definitely be coming back to visit and as matter of fact I have already recommended this hotel to another couple I met at my hotel, The Chattanooga Choo Choo.
reviews.title: A wonderful trip

reviews.text: We had the pleasure of staying here on the weekend of Christmas 2012. My family and I really enjoyed the atmosphere, it was very beautiful and relaxing. We has a Oceanview room for the weekend that opened directly in front of the pool/hottube. The private patio with the swing, the soft relaxing music playing by the pool, the sound of the ocean really made my weekend. The staff was very nice and friendly I really did not want to leave. I will be planning another trip really soon. Everything about Lotus Inn & Suites was an excellent experience.
reviews.title: Diamond- Great Place and Good People

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were at the end of a 4600 mile auto trip and we needed a lift to get us home to SW Florida. The minute we walked into the office at the Lotus we knew we'd found it!
reviews.title: great place and good people

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We took a look at two rooms and my wife said we'll take the one with the view on the ocean side. The waves were crashing and the fog was in and we just loved it.
reviews.title: Miami Style - this is the place to stay in Ormond Beach!

reviews.text: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Found most of the reviews to be very accurate. Loved the fire pit by the pool. Rooms have a very modern decor. My room had a king and a queen bed. The sink was outside the bathroom which I didn't particularly like. I don't believe all the rooms have this set up. Really enjoyed the coffee, cappaccino, latte etc. machine available in the lobby. Available all day for FREE. Very friendly professional staff. beautiful beach. For the money you really can't ask for much more. would definitely go back.
reviews.title: Excellent for the $

reviews.text: Booked a room last minute for one night. This is a true boutique hotel at a great price. Right on the beach, fresh renovation, a little Asian flair. Beds was very comfortable. Fire pit area is nice, hot tub, great landscape, nice pool area, complimentary cappuccino machine in the lobby, great bathrooms and shower. Spotless room. Free Internet is really fast. I will definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.text: Up to date clean rooms. Mark at front desk was very pleasant and offered to light the fire at any time for us. The bathrooms are modern.
reviews.title: Tranquil beachfront oasis

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They could use some utensils, etc. for the kitchenette rooms. Loved the variety of water fountains and great location to the beach.
reviews.title: Just loved it..

reviews.text: My husband and me found a great deal for one night staying at lotus inn. So we booked it a few hours before arriving. But just for one night, cause you don´t buy a pig in a poke.;) After arriving there and getting a room i was so glad..it has been the best accommodity of our whole 3,5 week-tour through the east of the usa. And iam not demanding a great deal..
reviews.title: Very nice ..job well done by proprietor

description: BRAND NEW DAYTONA BEACH AREA LUXURY HIGH END EURO STYLE ART DECO HOTEL. This newly remodeled Oceanfront European style boutique hotel offers a high quality of atmosphere, ambiance, professional warmness while providing the highest level of service. Featuring Rooms with Italian Tile, Vessel Sinks, Contemporary artwork, high level of technology and more. Offering many different room types including suites with kitchenettes to jacuzzi rooms to standard rooms. From oceanfront bamboo cabanas, heated pool and spa, to our granite rock fire fountain, anywhere on this property will make you feel like paradise.
